豱字的基本解释

豱
wēn
一种头短的猪。

豱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wēn］
［《廣韻》烏渾切，平魂，影。］
猪的一种。腹部、躯干、头、足俱短、毛色赤黑而短。参见“豱豬頭”。

豱字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豱； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1198第14
【廣韻】烏渾切【集韻】烏昆切，?音温。豕名。【爾雅·釋獸】豕，奏者豱。【註】今豱豬短頭，皮理腠蹙。○按爾雅本作豱俗作豱，非。豱字从?作。

豱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
豱字的起名意思

暂无。

豱
Basic explanation of words
豱
wēn
A short pig.
豱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wēn］
["Guangyun" Wuhunqi, Ping Hun, Shadow. ]
A kind of pig. The abdomen, torso, head and feet are short, and the hair color is red and short. See "Pinzhutou".
豱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Wu Character Department】　豱; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1198 Page 14
[Guangyun] Wuhunqi [Jiyun] Wukunqi, sound temperature. Hog name. [Erya·Shu Beast] hog, the player who plays the hog. [Note] This pig has a short head and a floppy skin. ○According to Erya's book as a vulgar as a vulgar, it is not. Bin character from? Compose.
